title: Tokens of the Lost (A Cat Carlyle Mystery)
features: Radio broadcast journalist Cat Carlyle has done it again, she's mistakenly stumbled into another murder mystery. When Cat and Sullivan discover a lost little girl inside an empty house, no one knows where the child came from or how she got inside. As Detective Sullivan works the missing child's case, a devastating tornado touches down in Guthrie and a serial killer uses the mayhem to dispose of his victim's bodies. There's more to be lost than possessions as Cat and Sullivan are soon to discover in...Tokens of the Lost.
description: New Mexico native, Oklahoma transplant, Betsy (Byrd) Randolph writes murder-mysteries primarily set in Guthrie, Oklahoma. Betsy holds numerous degrees in Journalism, Horticulture, Organizational Leadership, and an MFA in Creative Writing. Betsy's 20 plus years of law enforcement experience, plus her decade of radio broadcasting aid her in her writing. Betsy is a veteran, wife, mother, and grandmother. Visit her web site at betsyrandolph.com for more information.
